plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system for Claude Code with 228 specialized agents across 11 domains. V2 Universal Workflow Architecture with 5 universal workflow agents working across all domains via YAML configuration (streamlined from 283 agents, -19.4% optimization). 8 core infrastructure agents + 220 domain experts. Supports recursive workflows, configuration-driven behavior, and multi-domain coordination. Complete domains: software (41 agents), business (18), creative (17), planning (16), sales (17), marketing (21), finance (16), operations (15), hr (19), legal (14), support (15). Features Intelligence Layer, QA Layer, Executive Leadership, and comprehensive workflow orchestration. Universal /trigger, /designer, /reviewer commands work across all domains.
